annotation.scene_description: Multiple elongated warm signatures primarily located near clustered patterns, indicating potential debris or structured objects. Sparse thermal activities throughout the rest of the image.

anomalies.notable_features: Small, round thermal signature with mild temperature contrast
anomalies.anomaly_reasoning: The shape suggests debris or small logs; unlikely for person or animal

anomalies.notable_features: Irregularly shaped cluster with moderate heat intensity
anomalies.anomaly_reasoning: Shape and pattern are similar to stacked logs or organized debris

anomalies.notable_features: Small, vertically-oriented thermal signature with clear contrast against background
anomalies.anomaly_reasoning: Thermal intensity and shape are consistent with a standing or crouched person, possibly viewed from above
